name: Karol Stefan Mazur
body: Hi, I'm Karol. I'm an iOS developer based in Krakow, Poland. I currently work at [Base](http://getbase.com/) on our [iOS app](https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/base-crm-and-sales-tracking/id488534576?mt=8). You can find me on Twitter [@karolsmazur](http://twitter.com/karolsmazur).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
